name: Indijones Ana's Bizarre Adventure
description:
It is a developed for our 1st Game Design and Development coursework

Made by

Anson W

Danny N - https://dgnewsom.itch.io/

Chen F

Abdullah A

Yad

Assets used;

  • Coin Collectibles - Gold Coins | 3D Props
  • Gem Collectibles - Simple Gems Ultimate Animated Customizable Pack | 3D Props
  • Skeleton Enemy - Low Poly Skeleton | 3D Characters
  • Skeleton Enemy Animation - Basic Motions FREE Pack | 3D Animations
  • Chicken Enemy - Meshtint Free Chicken Mega Toon Series | 3D Animals
  • Dungeon Building - New Dungeon Pack Modular Low Poly (Free Version) | 3D Dungeons
  • Dungeon Rocks - LowPoly Rocks | 3D Environments
  • Chest - Free stylized chest animations 3D model
  • Player Model - Low Poly Fantasy Warrior | 3D Humanoids
  • Player Animation - https://www.mixamo.com/#/ 
  • Weapon Models - Low Poly Weapons RPG Items | 3D Weapons
  • Background music - Retro Music Pack by JDBArtist
  • Sound effects - sfxr

Vector arts, icons - Free vector icons - SVG, PSD, PNG, EPS & Icon Font - Thousands of free icons
